dublin_core.dcvalue: Cognitive behavioral therapy CBT for child anxiety although efficacious typically requires 16 20 weekly sessions with a therapist Brief CBT BCBT eight sessions for child anxiety is promising but may have less favorable outcomes owing to reduced session time Mobile health m health has the potential to improve BCBT efficacy by delivering ecological momentary intervention to engage youth in learning and practicing CBT skills in their everyday lives in vivo
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
The SmartCAT: an m-health platform for ecological momentary intervention in child anxiety treatment.
